professionalSummary: Full Stack Developer at Spiderworks Technologies specializing in scalable, production-grade applications. Experienced in microservices, event-driven systems, real-time data processing with Kafka and Redis, and AI-powered mobile and web apps. Proven ability to lead internal enterprise portal development from architecture to deployment.

description: Promoted from intern to permanent full-time developer.
Leading development of internal enterprise portals.
Working across accounts, work orders, invoice, and business modules.
Designing scalable backend systems and responsive frontend applications.
Handling database design, API architecture, and performance optimization.
experience.companyDescription: A leading digital marketing and IT solutions company based in Kerala, India, specializing in SEO, web development, and digital strategies.

projects.name: RentEazy
projects.longDescription: RentEazy is a comprehensive rental property management platform designed to streamline the entire lifecycle of property rental. Built with a scalable microservices architecture using Nx Monorepo, it efficiently handles complex workflows between Admins, Hosts, and Tenants. The system leverages Apache Kafka for asynchronous communication, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
features: User Roles: Distinct dashboards for Admin, Host, and Tenant.
Property Management: Hosts can list, edit, and manage property availability.
Booking System: Seamless booking flow with conflict detection.
Payments: Integrated secure payment gateways.
Real-time Notifications: Event-driven alerts for booking status updates.
challenges: Ensuring data consistency with eventual consistency patterns using Kafka.
Optimizing database queries for complex property filtering.
projects.developerThought: Building RentEazy taught me the intricacies of distributed systems. Choosing Kafka for inter-service communication was a game-changer for decoupling services, allowing independent scaling.
projects.instructions:
1. Clone the repo.
2. Run `npm install`.
3. Spin up Docker containers for Postgres and Kafka.
4. Run `nx serve host` and `nx serve tenant`.

projects.name: ShopeMe
projects.longDescription: ShopeMe is a high-performance retail billing system built to handle heavy transaction loads. It utilizes Redis for caching frequently accessed product data and Kafka for real-time inventory synchronization, ensuring that stock levels are always accurate across multiple checkout counters.
features: Fast Billing: Optimized checkout process for speed.
Inventory Sync: Real-time updates across multiple terminals.
Sales Analytics: Dashboard for daily/monthly sales reports.
Barcode Support: Integrated barcode scanner support.
challenges: Handling concurrency during peak billing hours.
Minimizing latency for database writes using write-behind caching.
projects.developerThought: Optimization was key here. Seeing the system handle 1000+ daily transactions without a hitch was incredibly satisfying.

projects.name: Food Planner
projects.longDescription: Food Planner is a mobile application that helps users maintain a healthy diet by generating personalized meal plans. It features an AI-powered food recognition system that allows users to snap a picture of ingredients to get recipe suggestions.
features: Ingredient Recognition: AI analysis of food photos.
Meal Planning: Weekly meal schedules based on dietary preferences.
Calorie Tracking: Integrated nutritional info from Spoonacular.
Shopping List: Auto-generated lists from selected recipes.
challenges: Integrating and optimizing the image recognition model for mobile devices.
projects.developerThought: This project bridged my interest in AI and mobile dev. It's fascinating how much value simple AI integrations can add to everyday apps.

projects.name: MyMC Web
projects.longDescription: MyMC Web connects Minecraft game servers with a web-based store and Discord community. It automates the delivery of in-game items upon purchase and syncs player ranks across the game and Discord.
features: Automated Delivery: Instant item delivery in-game.
Discord Sync: Roles and ranks synchronized automatically.
Storefront: Web interface for browsing and purchasing items.
Admin Panel: Manage sales and player logs.
projects.developerThought: Automation is powerful. Saving server admins hours of manual work every week was a huge win.

projects.name: Pet Care Management System
projects.longDescription: A robust management system for veterinary clinics. It streamlines appointment scheduling, manages digital health records for pets, and handles billing and inventory for the clinic.
features: Appointment Scheduling: Calendar view for vets.
Electronic Health Records (EHR): Digital history for every pet.
Inventory Management: Track medicines and supplies.
Billing: diverse payment options and invoice generation.
projects.developerThought: My first deep dive into Django. Its 'batteries-included' philosophy really sped up development for this CRUD-heavy application.

achievements: Built and deployed 5+ full stack production applications
Active in automation and game modding communities
careerGoal: To become a top-tier full stack architect building intelligent, scalable, real-world products.
